Stay on top of your account. Keep in mind, we\'ll still send you notifications for security reasons or if we need to contact you about your account.

We\'ll send you a push notification if there\'s an issue with your account, or add your email to allow you to update your profile.
Add as many addresses as you like. They\'re places you most often have things shipped.

If this is your mobile number, you give us permission to contact you about your PayPal branded accounts using automated calls or texts to: service your accounts, investigate fraud, or collect a debt, but not for telemarketing. If you don’t want to receive automated calls or texts, you can change your preferences by unchecking below:
We may still call you using other means if we need to speak with you.

When you activate One Touch™, we\'ll automatically log you in when you pay with PayPal from this phone. Please do not use this if you share your device.
All of the fingerprints stored on this device can be used to log into your PayPal account.
Your account is eligible for longer logged-in sessions for activities you do often.

Choose whether the offers and promotions you see are personalized for you. %s
We\'ll send info that\'s relevant to you. You can choose what you\'d like to get from us.

We\'ll send important info about our products and benefits to help you get the most from your account.
From travel to technology and fashion to food, we\'ll send discounts and offers from our partner brands.
With PayPal Credit, you can spread the cost of your purchases. Get credit-specific offers and promotions tailored to you.
From time to time, we\'ll invite you to share your opinions. By taking part, you can help us create an even better PayPal.
We\'re updating your preferences, which can take a little time. You may continue to get marketing emails over the coming days.
Review and update data and permissions you\'ve given to these apps and sites.

Why is my payment on hold?
If you have a new account, haven\'t sold something in a while, or received a request for a refund, you may have a payment put on hold. To get more info on holds, visit our Help Center.

2. Type in your mobile phone number
Confirm your mobile number and create a PIN in your Profile. When you\'re ready to pay, choose PayPal at the register, type in your mobile number and PIN, and you\'re good.
Take a moment to create a PIN in your profile. Then, when you\'re ready to pay, choose PayPal at the register, type in your mobile number and PIN, and you\'re good.
Toggle service options below to change which ATMs are displayed in search results

There\'s a level of convenience and security that\'s right for you.
Just wake up your phone to Tap & Pay.
The highest level of security. Log into your PayPal app before you pay.
Some stores will ask for a PIN.

Log into your PayPal app first. Then hold your phone over the reader to pay.
Hold your phone face-up over the payment reader and wait for the buzz
If you stop now, you’ll have to start the setup process all over again.
You’ll need to turn on NFC in your phone’s settings.

For in-store payments.\nYou can change this anytime.
If you have a PayPal balance, we’ll use that first. If there’s an issue with your preferred payment method, we’ll try the others linked to your PayPal account. View PayPal Policies.
We\'ve reviewed your information. Explore direct deposit, goals, and more by clicking below.

Low balance: Your PayPal balance is %1$s. Add money so you have enough to cover your future purchases.
PayPal isn\'t your default way to pay with Google Pay.
PayPal is your default way to pay with Google Pay.
Your PayPal balance isn\'t linked to Google Pay.

If there's not enough money in your PayPal balance at the time of your purchase, top up instantly pulls increments of %1$s from your linked bank account or debit card so your purchase doesn't get declined. This works if you pay with:

• PayPal Cash Card
• Google Pay
• Samsung Pay

If you turn automatic top up on or off for one of these services, you'll also turn it on or off for all of them.

If there's not enough money in your PayPal balance at the time of your purchase, top up instantly pulls increments of %1$s from your linked bank account or debit card so your purchase doesn't get declined. This works if you pay with:

%2$s
If you turn automatic top up on or off for one of these services, you'll also turn it on or off for all of them.
When you don\'t have enough in your PayPal balance, we\'ll add money from your bank or debit card in the amount you decide to cover the purchase.
Choose a bank or debit card to top up your balance from
This debit card will be used to top up your PayPal balance and make sure your transactions go through even if you don\'t have enough money for your purchases.
Do you want to turn automatic top up off?
When you don\'t have enough money in your PayPal balance, if you use PayPal Cash Card, Google Pay, and Samsung Pay, your purchase will get declined.
When you don\'t have enough money in your PayPal balance, if you use %1$s, your purchase will get declined.
When you don\'t have enough money in your PayPal balance, if you use %1$s, and %2$s, your purchase will get declined.
When you don\'t have enough money in your PayPal balance, if you use %1$s, %2$s, and %3$s, your purchase will get declined.
When you don\'t have enough money in your PayPal balance, if you use %1$s, %2$s, %3$s, and %4$s, your purchase will get declined.

If you don\'t have enough money in your balance, we\'ll ask you to pick one of your other payment methods.
Go to Security in your phone\'s Settings and turn on \"Verify Apps\." This helps us keep your PayPal app more secure. You can\'t log in until you turn it on.
Browse special offers from stores and brands.
You don\'t have any saved offers
This is where you\'ll see any offers you save. Offers are applied automatically when you pay with PayPal.
Use a code to send or receive money
Send money in a snap by scanning someone\'s PayPal code. Or, share your own code to receive money.
Change your device settings so that you can scan the code with PayPal.
What you\'re sharing: your name, your photo, and your PayPal.Me link, if you have one.
It doesn\'t look like that\'s a valid code. Try again.

Uh oh, you scanned your own code!
You can\'t send money to yourself. By the way, this is what you\'ll look like to others when they scan your code.

It might be busy with another app. Try restarting your phone.
Your PayPal QR code. What you\'re sharing: your name, your photo, and your PayPal.Me link, if you have one.

See your payments, purchases, and more right here.
Add your PayPal Cash Card to Google Pay
Pay for just about anything, easily and securely - right from your phone
Get the most out of PayPal
Help people know it\'s you they\'re paying, and have more control over what people see.
People can always change to Goods and Services. It gives them PayPal Purchase Protection on their eligible items.
People can always change to Personal Payments if they\'re paying you back or chipping in for a gift.
Free for your customers. You\'ll pay a fee to receive. You both get PayPal Purchase Protection on eligible items.
Your name and photo can still be seen by people who you\'ve sent and received money with.
Share your PayPal.Me link and get paid
Friends, family, or customers can follow the link, enter any amount and that\'s it. The money\'s usually in your PayPal account in seconds.

Your link now appears in your friends and customers\' PayPal address books - so they can be sure they\'re sending money to the right person. \n\nYou can now add more info to your profile and always be in control of what people see.
You can receive money through your PayPal.Me link.
You can\'t use your PayPal.Me to receive money. People can still pay you using the regular Send Money feature.
You can\'t use your PayPal.Me to receive money. People can still pay you using the regular Send Money feature.
Your PayPal.Me will be turned off, and you can\'t receive money with it. Your name and photo can still be seen by people who you\'ve sent and received money with.
Your PayPal.Me cannot be used to receive money.
I agree that my name, photo, and PayPal.Me link can be shown to others to make it easier to find me on PayPal and to transact with me, and I agree to the Terms & Conditions and Privacy Statement.
What type of payments are you accepting?
Let your friends pay you quickly and easily. It\'s free for both of you when they use their PayPal balances or bank accounts.
It\'s free for your customers. You\'ll pay a fee when you receive it. You both get PayPal Purchase Protection on eligible payments.
Adding whereabouts to your profile will help people know they\'ve found the right person.
The suggested locations are based on your PayPal primary address. If this is no longer up to date, you can edit your address.
Say something about you or your business to share on your profile.
Thanks for confirming your identity. Your %1$s transfer is all set. It should arrive in your bank account within 1 business day.
We couldn\'t confirm your identity. We\'re continuing to review your %1$s transfer, and it should be released to your bank account within the next %2$s hours.
